kategoriename.label: Kategoriename
kategoriename.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

beschreibung.label: Beschreibung
beschreibung.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).

datum.label: Datum
datum.description:
A calendar date consisting of year, month and day. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>` or `null`.

For example: `1642-12-25`.

beleg.label: Beleg/Quittung
beleg.description:
An uploaded file. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a URL to download the file in the form `https://<hostname>/files/<app-id>/data/<record-id>/<control-identifier>/<internal-id>` or `null`.

notizen.label: Notizen
notizen.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).

kategorie.label: Kategorie
kategorie.description:
A reference to another LivingApp record from a target lookup app (or `null`).

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.

beschreibung.label: Beschreibung
beschreibung.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

kategorie_auswahl.label: Kategorie
kategorie_auswahl.description:
A reference to another LivingApp record from a target lookup app (or `null`).

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.

beschreibung_ausgabe.label: Beschreibung
beschreibung_ausgabe.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

datum_ausgabe.label: Datum
datum_ausgabe.description:
A calendar date consisting of year, month and day. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>` or `null`.

For example: `1642-12-25`.

beleg_upload.label: Beleg/Quittung hochladen
beleg_upload.description:
An uploaded file. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a URL to download the file in the form `https://<hostname>/files/<app-id>/data/<record-id>/<control-identifier>/<internal-id>` or `null`.

notizen_ausgabe.label: Notizen
notizen_ausgabe.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).
